text:
@realDonaldTrump @GoyaFoods Let's see if I got this straight 🤔

You say Covid-19 is a hoax
You deny science 
U say the CDC is too strict 
U say BLM is hate indoctrination 
U say Corrupt cops R ok 
U love WhitePower
U won't let Fauci go to a news briefing 

But, 
U endorse product placement at same 

WOW👏
